SummaryEnglish: Springtime at Kimberly Magic Academy, when new students begin their first year. One boy, clad in black robes with a white cane and sword strapped to his hip, approaches the prestigious school. This young man—Oliver—must form a bond with a katana wielding girl named Nanao if he's to survive the dangers he's to face at this school that is anything but what it seems!
Aliases: Nanatsu no Maken ga Shihai suru
ななつのまけんがしはいする

1.SummaryEnglish: New student Oliver arrives at Kimberly Magic Academy, a house of learning where 20% of the students don't make it out in one piece.

2.SummaryEnglish: The new students settle into life at Kimberly, and Oliver has an intense duel with Nanao.

3.SummaryEnglish: The new students find themselves trapped in Kimberly at night, with two powerful upperclassmen out to recruit them dead or alive.

4.SummaryEnglish: After Katie is bullied by the other students, her friends end up in a classroom brawl. But that won't be the only fight they see...

5.SummaryEnglish: Nanao and Oliver face down a powerful foe who has designs on Katie.

6.SummaryEnglish: Oliver and Nanao battle a powerful mage with an enchanted eye, and the true purpose of Oliver's coming to Kimberly is revealed.

7.SummaryEnglish: Oliver and friends attend their first broomriding class. Meanwhile, Pete discovers something unexpected about himself.

8.SummaryEnglish: Another student challenges Oliver and his friends to see who's really the strongest of their grade.

9.SummaryEnglish: Katie is given a workshop, and she and her friends go into the labyrinth to take a look at it.

10.SummaryEnglish: Oliver and his friends are caught in a brutal team battle against other students deep within the labyrinth.

11.SummaryEnglish: Oliver and Chela fight a duel deep in the labyrinth, against an opponent who will do anything to avoid defeat.

12.SummaryEnglish: Oliver and Chela recruit an unexpected ally to help them venture into the labyrinth and get back Pete.

13.SummaryEnglish: Nanao, Oliver, and Chela venture through the labyrinth, encountering strange creatures and deadly threats.

14.SummaryEnglish: As everyone heads deeper beneath the academy, Godfrey and Carlos think back to Ophelia's past.

15.SummaryEnglish: Not without difficulty, the young heroes reach Ophelia. Then begins the fight for which everyone had prepared. Will Oliver and his friends manage to save the imprisoned students? Will they be able to overcome Ophelia?
